participants.name: Katie Perry
participants.description: Managing Partner & Co-Founder at Jamison Perry, LLC

messages.message:
Brian
Hey,
Do I know you from somewhere?  How did you find me on facebook?
Hey, no we dont know each other. I was really bored the other day at work and just started clicking on people.

Brian
Fair enough, where do you live?  Friends, college?
I live in Wichita, KS...Friends is a private university here...I am getting ready to transfer to Wichita State at semester. So what are you majoring in?

Brian
I am Majoring in Computer Science, and I'd like to minor in Photography, funny thing though; I haven't started either of those.  How about you?

Thats cool. I am a marketing major and I want to get a minor in accounting. Then I think I am going to get a masters in sports administration. I think I am going to do marketing for pro sports. So what do you like to do for fun?
